name: smmo-travel-only-dynamic
title: Auto Step
description: Melakukan auto step dengan menggunakan API Endpoint Matic.

parameters.name: api_token
parameters.label: Token API Akun
parameters.placeholder: Masukkan token API dari akun Anda

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/smmo \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer TOKEN_ANDA" \
  -d '{"destination_id": 4, "api_token": "TOKEN_API_ANDA"}'
